    private void loginButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // This sets up the Login Criteria
        String username = usernameText.getText();
        String password = passwordText.getText();

        if(username.equalsIgnoreCase("payroll") && password.equalsIgnoreCase("payroll")) {
            setVisible(false);
            dispose();
            MenuFrame frame1 = new MenuFrame();
            frame1.setVisible(true);
        } else {
            // And returns an error message if wrong data is entered. 
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Invalid login Details");
            usernameText.setText("");
            passwordText.setText("");
        }
}                                           

    private void loginButtonKeyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt) {                                       
        // This sets up the Login Criteria
        String username = usernameText.getText();
        String password = passwordText.getText();

        if(username.equalsIgnoreCase("Will") && password.equalsIgnoreCase("Hogan")) {
            setVisible(false);
            dispose();
            MenuFrame frame1 = new MenuFrame();
            frame1.setVisible(true);
        } else {
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Invalid login Details");
            usernameText.setText("");
            passwordText.setText("");
        }
}                                      

    private void cancelButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                             
        // This Cancels you out of the Admin Login Form.
        setVisible(false);
        dispose();
}                                            

    private void usernameTextKeyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt) {                                        
        // Enables the Password textField on Enter.
        if(evt.getKeyCode()==java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_ENTER)
        {
            passwordText.setEnabled(true);
            passwordText.requestFocusInWindow();
        }
    }                                       

    private void formWindowOpened(java.awt.event.WindowEvent evt) {                                  
        // Sets default field status.
        usernameText.setText("");
        usernameText.requestFocusInWindow();
        passwordText.setEnabled(false);
    }
